short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor pull request updates for selected Azure DevOps organizations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to monitor pull request updates for selected Azure DevOps organizations.
No special authentication required, it uses browser saved cookies for auth.
